longDescription: Kozhikode is a city renowned for its rich food culture, but for both tourists and locals, discovering authentic, high-quality local dishes can be a challenge amidst the vast number of options. Kerala Food Spot is a specialized Telegram bot I developed to act as the ultimate culinary guide for the city. Developed using Python and the Telebot library, the bot helps users discover authentic local dishes and famous restaurants. It offers personalized recommendations based on cuisine type, location, and user ratings, making it an interactive and invaluable tool for exploring the city's vibrant food scene.
